data.summary: Verify that settings persist across profiles

priority.name: P1
priority.description: Performance of an important component of the Software has degraded from normal performance or functionality which impacts system operations significantly.

data.precondition:
Note1: On LIGHTBEAM and ROKU settings are profile-specific, so the opposite will be expected. You can pass this test on a LB platform if you see that every profile keeps its own settings. 
 https://wbdstreaming.atlassian.net/browse/GCX-20476
 More info on https://wbdstreaming.atlassian.net/browse/PLAY-86
 Note2: for CDEV devices consult here https://wbdstreaming.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GCX/pages/308510971/Video+and+device+support to see whether the inline hero video is available. If NOT, Autopreview enabled settings missing from Settings page

data.summary: Parental Controls - KPE is Off when adding new profile

priority.name: P1
priority.description: Performance of an important component of the Software has degraded from normal performance or functionality which impacts system operations significantly.

data.precondition:
By default, Kid-Proof Exit is turned off for new kid profiles and there is no existing Parent code. Creating Parent Code when adding new kids profile can only be done on web Or in Cdev app. Users on CTV will not be able to select the KPE option. 
 _NOTE_ If there is _an existing kid profile with Parent Pin on the account_ then the user can toggle KPE to on. This test case is to verify that the default state is OFF when in create new Kids profile flow.
